description: Handy data structures for elements keyed by string.
name: d3-collection

scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git push --tags && cp build/d3-collection.js ../d3.github.com/d3-collection.v0.2.js && cp build/d3-collection.min.js ../d3.github.com/d3-collection.v0.2.min.js && cd ../d3.github.com && git add d3-collection.v0.2.js d3-collection.v0.2.min.js && git commit -m "d3-collection ${VERSION}" && git push && cd - && zip -j build/d3-collection.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-collection.js build/d3-collection.min.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-collection.js -c -m -o build/d3-collection.min.js
scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && json2module package.json > build/package.js && rollup -f umd -n d3_collection -o build/d3-collection.js -- index.js
